RESOLVED_ENTITIES.United States Magistrate Judge: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., described as "riding low"
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alberto Ramirez: Director of Transportation, Planning and Development for the Texas Department of Transportation, Laredo Division, who testified about the accuracy of traffic flow data
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas Department of Transportation: Agency responsible for preparing district traffic maps
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol agent who conducted the initial stop and testified about his observations, including the commonality of encountering illegal aliens wearing caps after walking through brush
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Paved road with two lanes, one in each direction, and no shoulder, where United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino encountered the defendants' vehicles
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.J. Scott Hacker: United States Magistrate Judge who signed the Report and Recommendation
